titles.title: To provide that the income tax shall not apply for taxable years during which the taxpayer, or either spouse of a married couple, is serving in the war in Iraq.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/16/2005--Introduced. Exempts an individual, or either spouse of a married couple, from income tax in a year in which such individual serves for any portion of such year on active Armed Forces service in a combat zone in Iraq.
